A

addBlog() - Static method in class controllers.BloggerController
Method addBlog() adds a blog to our list of all blogs and saves to database through the method createBlog() located here in the BlgggerController;
addComment(int) - Static method in class controllers.CommentController
Method binds values from postoComment form and creates new comment using create method from Comment model.
addCredits() - Static method in class controllers.CreditController
This method shows the User the page, where he should enter in the form the amount of Credits that he wants to buy;
addCreditsProcess() - Static method in class controllers.CreditController
Method should take the amount entered in the form as the amount of Credit that the User wants to buy'
addFaq() - Static method in class controllers.FAQController
Method adds a new FAQ to the list
addMainCategory() - Static method in class controllers.CategoryController
Method addMainCategory adds new category into the list and also in the database and it will also check if that name is taken;
addPikStore() - Static method in class controllers.UserController
 
addProduct() - Static method in class controllers.JsonController
 
addProduct() - Static method in class controllers.ProductController
Method takes the usernameSes from the session variable and sends it to the addProduct.html page; Where the Form for publishing the product needs to be filled in order to add the Product;
address - Variable in class models.User
 
addSubCategory(int) - Static method in class controllers.CategoryController
Method addSubCategory adds new sub category into the list and also in the database and it will also check if that name is taken
addUser() - Static method in class controllers.UserController
1.
AdminFilter - Class in helpers
 
AdminFilter() - Constructor for class helpers.AdminFilter
 
adminPanel() - Static method in class controllers.UserController
If user is administrator send him to adminProfile.html
allCategory() - Static method in class controllers.CategoryController
Method allCategory list all of present categories at single view
allFaqs() - Static method in class controllers.FAQController
Method shows a list of all FAQs, visible to all users, registered or not
allMainCategories() - Static method in class models.MainCategory
Method returns all of MainCategory instances
allMessages() - Static method in class controllers.UserController
Method sends two lists to view, list of received messages and list of sent messages for one user.
allPikStores() - Static method in class controllers.UserController
 
allProducts - Static variable in class controllers.StatsController
 
allUsers() - Static method in class controllers.UserController
Method list all users registered in database
allUsersComment(int) - Static method in class controllers.UserController
 
answer - Variable in class models.FAQ
 
Application - Class in controllers
Application Class; Contains our main methods and one inner class Contact; Methods contained in the class are : - index(); - newViewForFilter(); - chooseRegistration(); - registrationPikStore(); - registration(); - login(); - logout(); - contact(); - sendMail();
Application() - Constructor for class controllers.Application
 
Application.Contact - Class in controllers
Inner private class used for the Contact function; The function to send the message to the bitpikgroup@gmail.com which is the admins and the bitpik portal official email;
ApplicationTest - Class in controllers
 
ApplicationTest() - Constructor for class controllers.ApplicationTest
 
applyTheStringViewForStats(User) - Static method in class controllers.StatsController
Used by methods > createStatisticsFile() & showStats(); This method applies the view for the statsproduct.html page and the excel file; What it actually does is makes the representation of all the data that is show to String values;
author - Variable in class models.Comment
 
availabilityS - Variable in class controllers.ProductController.FilteredSearch
